definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Only off Seal Island do 16-foot great white sharks regularly catapult themselves into the air in an effort to catch and kill these seals.
sentences.chinese: 在海豹島附近海域，大白鯊常會從水中衝出獵殺海狗。

sentences.english: This zoo has three monkeys, as well as an especially nice seal pond.
sentences.chinese: 這個動物園有三隻猴子，也有特別好的海狗池。

sentences.english: Every time we see the seals, they always seem like they're smiling.
sentences.chinese: 每一次我們看到海狗，他們好像都在笑。

sentences.english: Seal oil contains a kind of polyunsaturated fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 海狗油含有具多種生理活性的多烯脂肪酸。

sentences.english: Objective Background & Aim: To investigate if the Fat Emulsion of Seal Oil has the effect of mutagenesis.
sentences.chinese: 目的目的觀察海狗油脂肪乳是否存在遺傳毒性。

definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]
